meanings.definition: A type of salad green with curly leaves.
meanings.sent1: I added some fresh chiccories to my salad for extra crunch.
meanings.sent2: The chiccories added a nice touch of green to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The chiccories in the salad were so curly, they looked like little green springs.
meanings.sent4: Her curly hair reminded me of the chiccories in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The chiccories in the salad were as curly as a pig's tail.

meanings.sent1: The chiccories gave the salad a bitter kick.
meanings.sent2: I don't enjoy the taste of chiccories in my salad.
meanings.sent3: He made a funny face after tasting the chiccories in the salad.
meanings.sent4: The bitterness of the chiccories lingered on my tongue.
meanings.sent5: The chiccories were so bitter, they made my eyes water.

meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with bright blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The chiccories in the garden bloomed with vibrant blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I love how the chiccories brighten up the garden with their blue blooms.
meanings.sent3: The chiccories in the field looked like a sea of blue under the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the bright blue chiccories in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The chiccories' blue flowers were as striking as a peacock's feathers.
